title: August Rehabilitation Training Plan
description: Following the advice of doctors and rehabilitation therapists, and to support foot recovery while maintaining overall physical fitness, an August rehabilitation training plan has been formulated: engage in rehabilitative swimming or strength training 2–3 times per week. Swimming should focus on low-intensity, long-distance aerobic exercise, while strength training should emphasize equipment-based exercises, avoiding high-impact activities. Tentatively scheduled swimming sessions are on Mondays, Thursdays, or Fridays, and strength training on Tuesdays and Saturdays, with adjustments possible based on actual circumstances.
summarized_info: Yu Xiaowei created an August rehabilitation training plan in the calendar, clearly stating that she will engage in rehabilitative swimming or strength training 2-3 times per week.
